title: Himi 115
lyrics:
M.L.
1.
Sīsū ko ho ta’ata’a,
Pea mo ho angatonu
Ko ‘eku teunga pē ia
Pea matamata lelei.
2.
’I he’eku teunga’aki
‘A e teunga pe ko ia,
Pea u fiemālie ai,
‘I he ngaahi maama vela.
3.
He kuo ‘aofia au,
‘Eiki ‘e ho ta’ata’a
Mei he mā, mo e hia,
Pea u ‘ata’atāina.
4.
Pea ‘oku ou tui ni,
Ko hoku ‘Eiki pē koe;
Mo hoku ‘Otua foki,
‘Oku ou malu’ia ai.
5.
Ko ho ta’ata’a tapu,
‘I he nofo’anga ‘ofa;
‘Oku ‘aonga ma’u ai pē,
Ki he kakai angahala.
6.
Pea na’e lingi ia,
‘I he’eku angaia;
Pea ko e hao’anga,
Ki māmami kotoa pē. *
